statements.query: MATCH (n:AzureCosmosDBLocation)<-[:WRITE_PERMISSIONS_FROM]-(:AzureDatabaseAccount)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureSubscription{id: {AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID}})<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureTenant{id: {AZURE_TENANT_ID}})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: {WORKSPACE_ID}}) WHERE n.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH n LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DETACH DELETE (n) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted

MATCH (:AzureCosmosDBLocation)<-[r:WRITE_PERMISSIONS_FROM]-(:AzureDatabaseAccount)<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureSubscription{id: {AZURE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID}})<-[:RESOURCE]-(:AzureTenant{id: {AZURE_TENANT_ID}})<-[:OWNER]-(:CloudanixWorkspace{id: {WORKSPACE_ID}}) WHERE r.lastupdated <> {UPDATE_TAG} WITH r LIMIT {LIMIT_SIZE} DELETE (r) return COUNT(*) as TotalCompleted
